description: QuickVid turns your content into viral shorts. Copilot and Autopilot options available
title: Instant AI Clip Generation and Posting | QuickVid
introduction: QuickVid is a generative AI video tool that automates short form video creation with a single click. It offers two main plans: Copilot and Autopilot, catering to different levels of user involvement. Copilot allows manual editing and posting, while Autopilot is a completely hands-off plan. The tool includes features like auto-subtitles, virality score evaluation, smart clip discovery, dynamic layouts, speaker detection, and generated metadata.
pricing: Monthly and Yearly plans available, with Copilot at $20.00/month and Autopilot at $200.00/month. Copilot offers standard QuickVid access for effortless short video generation and editing, while Autopilot provides a hands-off experience for busy creators.
